content: Which superhero, created by Stan Lee and Jack Kirby, gains his powers from exposure to gamma radiation during a failed experiment?

I think the superhero you're referring to is the Incredible Hulk. He was created by Stan Lee and Jack Kirby, and he gains his incredible strength and durability after being exposed to gamma radiation during a scientific experiment that went wrong. The character first appeared in The Incredible Hulk #1 in May 1962.
